Dialogue.Page: Mod: Eye of the Storm Authors: Nolram, JohnCorby, and friends
Eye of the Storm was a cancelled mod for Outer Wilds that unveils a new Nomai project called the WASP that was built after the Ash Twin Project before the Interloper came.
The mod was in pre-development stage for two years and several arguments between the developers over design choices caused the mod to ultimately be cancelled.
Not much of it is very well known by the Outer Wilds modding community, but there's no reason for this mod with great potential to be forgotten.
